discourse_list.title: Centrifuge Tinlake: A framework for bringing real world assets into MCD

content.content: We’ve just published a comprehensive write up on how we asset originators such as factoring companies, mortgage brokers and others can use Tinlake to add real world assets to MCD. In the coming weeks some of our first users will be publishing their applications in the forum for assets such as music streaming royalties. We’re looking forward to the community’s feedback and questions! https://medium.com/centrifuge/centrifuge-tinlake-adding-real-world-assets-to-mcd-68cbcb67e9a4
@spin My understanding is that we now have a collateral onboarding process that is ready for action, MIP6: Collateral Onboarding Form/Forum Template Can we get Tinlake going again?

Yes, very much indeed. We will be commenting on MIP6 in the coming days and are looking forward to the community vote on the new MIPs. Going forward we are planning to work with our different asset originators to start following that process.
There is no need to wait for MIP6 ratification. Please proceed immediately with the preliminary process.
